interface.name: AlgorithmMethod
interface.javadoc:
An abstract representation of an algorithm defined in the XML Security specifications. Subclasses represent specific types of XML security algorithms, such as a {@link javax.xml.crypto.dsig.Transform}.
Sean Mullan
JSR 105 Expert Group
1.6
Returns the algorithm URI of this AlgorithmMethod. the algorithm URI of this AlgorithmMethod

Returns the algorithm parameters of this AlgorithmMethod. the algorithm parameters of this AlgorithmMethod. Returns null if this AlgorithmMethod does not require parameters and they are not specified.
